data.event: In 1913, Oregon Short Line Railroad built a branch into this part of Malheur County.
Riverview post office was established in 1911, but moved across the river in 1915 and the name changed to Adrian in 1919.
Riverview post office was established in 1911, but moved across the river in 1915 and the name changed to Adrian in 1919.

event.title: did not arrive in the area until 1916

data.event: It was previously thought that the city was named for James Adrian, a sheep rancher, but he did not arrive in the area until 1916.
